meanings.definition: To cover or fill with gum.
meanings.sent1: She was gumming the paper to the wall.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter was gumming the edges of the wood together.
meanings.sent3: The kids were gumming the art project with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The glue was gumming the pieces together like magic.
meanings.sent5: The sticky substance was gumming everything in its path.

meanings.sent1: He was gumming on a piece of bubblegum.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys gumming on minty gum after meals.
meanings.sent3: The cow looked funny gumming away on the grass.
meanings.sent4: The sound of gumming echoed in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: Gumming slowly helps in relaxing the jaw muscles.

meanings.sent1: Her constant gumming annoyed her classmates.
meanings.sent2: The teacher noticed his gumming during the test.
meanings.sent3: The loud gumming in the library broke the silence.
meanings.sent4: The rhythmic gumming was a familiar sound in the office.
meanings.sent5: The non-stop gumming was a habit she couldn't break.
